item.title: On deck combinations and probabilities of drawing cards
item.description: Or how can I compute the probability of drawing any number of cards from any number of specific sets of cards on the first hand. - Table top games are a wonderland of maths and probability, much more than one may be willing to think about when trying to seek pleasure, maybe even disconnect the mind with a simple game. Card games, in this, are no exception. Itâ€™s practical use, its easy application in everyday life...

item.title: Sample Exploratory Data Analysis in Python on personal habit data
item.description: In this article I aim at go through the process of analysis of a sample database, a database that I built while tracking a few of my habits with the HabitBull app. With the app I daily import manually the data. The insights on the data provided by app are...
